item.title: Why I Write
item.description: George Orwell is one of my favourite authors. His famous essay, which the title of this post references, is well worth a read. This is no great essay, and I am no Orwell. But I wanted to set out some of my reasons for having a blog. If you’re familiar with the motives for writing that he presents, you will recognise them in varying proportions in the below: I want to write to affirm my personal voice.
